thread.title: Dr. Ronald G. Shapiro
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by Dr. Ronald G. Shapiro

author: Dr. Ronald G. Shapiro
title: Dr. Ronald G. Shapiro
text: Hodges Badge provides high quality, beautiful ribbons for awarding at our Education By Entertainment programs. We purchase several packages of the Champion and Awesome ribbons each year. We also purchase Birthday ribbons as needed. Frequently we attach the ribbons to stuffed animals and award these as prizes. Service is excellent. I also follow Hodges Badge on FaceBook.
